attributes.review: This is the worst app ever who ever thought this app was a good idea should be fired immediately, it constantly glitches and has way to many bugs.the idea of this app is slightly offensive.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review:
This app is absolutely horrible!!! I turned my phone off while I went to go walk my pet velociraptor and when I returned back home this app talked!!! And guess what it told me to do?!?!?!?!?!?!? IT TOLD ME TO GO BACK TO THE PARK AND LEAVE MY PETS POOP ON THE GRASS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Absolutely traumatizing. Iâ€™m not sure if Iâ€™ll be able to sleep after that. And the worst part is.. IT TOLD ME TO.. IT TOLD ME TO BRUSH MY TEETH *BEFORE* EATING BREAKFAST!!!! Iâ€™m not sure Iâ€™ll be able to recover. So being the smart cookie I am I decided to talk back to it. I told I hope it trips over a stone and falls down a giant mountain, falls into a never ending hole with giant llamas continuously spitting at it. I also told it to watch the conjuring so it would get scared and poop itâ€™s pants. Then it talked back to me and told me it would rob my sisters pet fish!!!!!! I told her and she was absolutely terrified. She then had to go to therapy for 2 years. About a week later I came home to soggy poop in my fridge!! My velociraptor pushed me over and started munching on it and then had colorful diarrhea for a week! But thatâ€™s okay because I used it to cook colorful skittle cookies. Once I went back on the app it started talking to me again and it sent a horse over to my house and it had a note on it back which said â€œrate this app 5 stars or I will steal your child.â€ The worst part is I donâ€™t even have a child. And thatâ€™s what scarred me. This app stole my child, so whoâ€™s to say it wonâ€™t steal yours?! Thats why you should switch to SCjhonson, a family company. Amen.
